title: This Marvel-themed high school dance routine will blow you away
text:
Even Thanos would be in awe of this high school's Marvel dance routine.

Interested in Marvel? Add Marvel as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Marvel news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

The PAC Dance Team at Walden Grove High School in Sahuarita, Arizona, put on a seven-minute routine, featuring every beloved character from the MCU, including the Avengers themselves!

The highly skilled dance team showed off their MCU moves for the school's annual themed homecoming pep rally in early September.

The routine begins with Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Captain Marvel, Black Widow and Spider-Man storming out to Alan Silvestri's iconic Avengers theme.

Courtesy Kristi Lopez

The next seven minutes is full of twists and turns, introductions to more characters in the Marvel universe and battles galore -- all perfectly choreographed to music by Walden Grove High School teacher and head coach Kristi Lopez, with help from Carlos Quihuiz.

Since being posted to YouTube, the PAC Dance Team's routine has racked up more than 3 million views in less than two weeks -- and caught the attention of some of Marvel's biggest superheroes!

Captain Marvel herself, Brie Larson, herself returned to Twitter after a five-month hiatus to share the video with her fans and declare it, "FRICKEN AWESOME."

Hello I have returned to twitter for two seconds to tell you that THIS IS FRICKEN AWESOME https://t.co/HJAaPihYh3 — Brie Larson (@brielarson) September 16, 2019

Mark Ruffalo and Benedict Cumberbatch also sang its praises on their own social channels.

This isn't the first time one of the PAC Dance Team's routines has gone viral.

The public high school dance troupe, who are five-time state champions in the large group varsity hip-hop division, is known for performing incredible routines every homecoming and were featured on "America's Got Talent" in 2017.

Themes from past homecoming performances include Harry Potter, Pixar and "The Wizard of Oz" themes. You can watch PAC Dance Team's Harry Potter dance routine from last year below.
description: Even Thanos would be in awe of this high school's Marvel dance routine.
